mapper.update: update genre set genre_name=#{genre_name} where genre_num=#{genre_num}
mapper.select: SELECT g.genre_num, g.genre_name, g.category_num, c.category_name FROM genre g, category c WHERE g.category_num = c.category_num and g.category_num = #{category_num} ORDER BY c.category_num, g.genre_num
